name: Xplo adventures
description:
Pitch

Follow Xplo, the space explorer, in their adventure on an unknown planet. What will you discover there?

Credits

Thanks to people sharing their amazing work online:

Art kit by Kenney
https://www.kenney.nl/assets/bit-platformer-pack

https://twitter.com/KenneyNL

Music by Nicole Marie T

https://opengameart.org/content/spy-16bit-8bit-chiptune-retro-style-song-for-you...

https://twitter.com/musicvsartstuff

Font by Datagoblin
https://datagoblin.itch.io/monogram

https://twitter.com/vmenezio

WebGL template by Sean
https://seansleblanc.itch.io/better-minimal-webgl-template

https://twitter.com/seansleblanc

The project sources can be found here
https://github.com/Clement-R/secret-santa-2020

Feel free to reuse my code without permission or credits but please respect others' work by providing credits if you use the art kit, music, font, etc.
